answers.answer: Bump..please if anyone has had a close call like this id really appreciate your help

Hey hun. Don't stress. I am ALWAYS tested for diabetes because I'm over weight. I always pass by .4....the top level is 7.8 and I was 7.4. All 3 of my kids have been like this. But my fasting rate is extremely good, 3.4! And that was after a coffee and chocolate freddo frog!!! So don't stress. Keep eating healthy. And look forward. If you develop gestational diabetes it's not your fault. These things happen. All you can do is control how you deal with it.
Iv been trying to put my mind at easy since my doctors appointment so thank you for responding, I really appreciate it (:
I passed my test by only one point the doctor said they might test me again but never did and everything turned great.
They had u do the 3 hr test even tho u passed the 1 hr? I did my 1 hr test and never heard back about it so I take it i passed. But I thought u only do 3 hr if u fail the 1 hr 1.

Oh good, she didn't tell me she was going to test me again but said if it was her she would consider herself diabetic which makes me feel like I basically am even though I technically passed, im glad yours worked out fine I hope mine does thanks for your response

Thats what I thought that you only get tested once but she said they test their expecting mothers a second time between 24-28wks..I don't have insurance so this is a midwife at my local clinic, it just upset she made me feellike I hhave it even though I dont she even set up appointments  with a nutritionist and sent in the gestational diabetes lady to talk to me..

I failed my 1st and passed the 3 hour one by only by a smidgen. My little one came naturally 3 weeks early and was 7.12 so they think I probably would have had a big baby if I had gone to 40 weeks besides that all was good!
When do you get your 1st test and what happens during it?.. My appointment is next week and I asked the doctor how long would it be she told me 3 hours... Did I miss something?

Hey hun. Don't stress. I am ALWAYS tested for diabetes because I'm over weight. I always pass by .4....the top level is 7.8 and I was 7.4. All 3 of my kids have been like this. But my fasting rate is extremely good, 3.4! And that was after a coffee and chocolate freddo frog!!! So don't stress. Keep eating healthy. And look forward. If you develop gestational diabetes it's not your fault. These things happen. All you can do is control how you deal with it.

Be glad you passed it i had to do 2 glucose tests since i found out i was pregnant. And they found out i have gestational diabetes now i have to check my glucose levels 5x's a day. Feel blessed. You may not develop it and if you have a family history you could be more likely to but, it's not a definite yes. Just be mindful of what you eat and drink. Drink plenty of water.

question: I passed my first 1hr glucose test, and I just found out I passed my 3hr glucose test but ONLY by 1point..I feel so depressed about that, I feel like im going to get Gestational diabetes by the end of my pregnancy..has anyone else passed by just 1point and been just fine and still never developed it??
title: my 3hour glucose
